items.sentence: My French would likely be much better today if I\'d studied with a native speaker.
According to my accountant, this isn\'t a good time to invest in the stock market.
The teacher claimed that he\'d have us all speaking fluent French in three months.
I doubt that Tom had to sell his car in order to raise money for medical expenses.
I don\'t want to have to hurt you, but if you get in my way, I\'ll have no choice.
